MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH4 postcode area of Penymyndd, affecting properties in Old Hope Road and surrounding streets. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:19PM . Our engineers are on site and will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 1.16PM on 5TH November 2020
